rdf:Description.dc:title: Wildlife roadkills and potential mitigation in Alberta 1983
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Sanderson, Kim.
Environment Council of Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Examines seriousness of road kill problem in Alberta with regard to damage to wildlife and damage to persons and property. Also provides discussion and assessment of various mitigation measures.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Traffic safety and wildlife
Wildlife conservation.
